title: two truths exist simultaneously
desc: you learn this in primary school

panels.alt: A cowboy riding left to right, smoking. The sun is up and there are birds in the sky
panels.text:
breakfast is the most 
 important meal of the day
panels.hovertext: guess who had breakfast this morning

panels.alt: A cowboy riding right to left, smoking. The moon is up and there are stars in the sky
panels.text:
I am the most important 
 cowboy in the desert
panels.hovertext: guess who had breakfast this morning
